```{r}
# libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```

```{r}
# view data
view(diamonds)
```

## Exploring data

```{r}
# explore data
names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
```

```{r}
# pt 2
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)
```

## Pairs Plot

```{r}
GGally::ggpairs(diamonds)
```

## ggez plot

```{r}
# plot dat 
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = price, y = carat)) + 
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
# histogram
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) + 
  geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
# boxplot
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = clarity, y = price)) + 
  geom_boxplot()
```
